<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="block_nbt_num_set" inline="false"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">baseTier</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">the zone size will be 15 always but plus the baseTier, for example 1 + 15 = 16

tier 2, 15 + 2 = 17 so as the player upgrades the base the zone increases automatically </comment><value name="A"><block type="block_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">baseTier</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
